programs.program_name: 听力与言语康复学专业（四年制）

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: minimum Grade D in 2 subjects including Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.
entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Grade B in 5 Subjects including 2Bs from Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma: Minimum CGPA 2.75 (Diploma in related field). Candidates with CGPA below 2.75 but and with 3 years relevant working experience are also accepted. .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Pass STPM with minimum GPA 2.33 in 2 subjects including Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: Pass Foundation with minimum GPA 2.33 in 2 subjects including Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma: Pass with at least 24 points with minimum 12 points from Higher Level subjects and a minimum of 9 points from their Standard Level subjects .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

course_content.core: 专业基础课 康复医学概论 听力学概论 正常人体解剖学 生理学 普通心理学 言语语言神经基础 言语治疗学总论 人体发育学 医用物理学基础 言语听觉科学基础 正常人体解剖学 声学语音学 中国传统康复基础 中西医结合耳鼻咽喉科学 专业课 构音语音障碍 运动性言语障碍 临床听力学 嗓音障碍 康复听力学 小儿听力学 吞咽障碍 失语症 儿童语言障碍 中国传统康复技能 小学期实践 康复实践 听力康复见习 文书写作与普通话艺术 聋儿康复见习 言语康复见习 听力言语康复实训 毕业实习 科室轮转 岗前培训 技能考试 综述 毕业实习讲座

A-Level.text: minimum Grade D in 2 subjects including Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

UEC.text: Grade B in 5 Subjects including 2Bs from Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

Diploma.text: Minimum CGPA 2.75 (Diploma in related field). Candidates with CGPA below 2.75 but and with 3 years relevant working experience are also accepted. .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

STPM.text: Pass STPM with minimum GPA 2.33 in 2 subjects including Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

Foundation.text: Pass Foundation with minimum GPA 2.33 in 2 subjects including Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

IB Diploma.text: Pass with at least 24 points with minimum 12 points from Higher Level subjects and a minimum of 9 points from their Standard Level subjects .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

programs.program_name: 食品卫生与营养学专业（四年制）

entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Grade B in 5 Subjects including 2Bs from Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma: Minimum CGPA 2.75 (Diploma in related field). Candidates with CGPA below 2.75 but and with 3 years relevant working experience are also accepted. .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Pass STPM with minimum GPA 2.33 in 2 subjects including Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: Pass Foundation with minimum CGPA 2.33 in 2 subjects including Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

course_content.core: 专业基础课 生理学 解剖学 中医基础理论 中医诊断学 医用化学 生物化学 疾病学基础（一） 疾病学基础（二） 卫生统计学 方药学 营养专业英语 专业课 基础营养 健康教育学 食品分析与检验 营养流行病学 公共营养 诊断学 食品毒理 膳食设计与管理 临床医学基础（内科） 临床医学基础（外妇儿科） 中医药膳 中医药膳实训 临床营养 食品安全与食品卫生 外科学总论 小学期实践 食品加工与烹饪（含劳动教育） 营养教育与咨询（含劳动教育） 公共卫生及其发展趋势讲座 食品安全管理 食品卫生讲座 人文社会实践 人文教育 毕业实习 岗前培训 专业实习 毕业设计 综合实验 毕业论文答辩

UEC.text: Grade B in 5 Subjects including 2Bs from Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

Diploma.text: Minimum CGPA 2.75 (Diploma in related field). Candidates with CGPA below 2.75 but and with 3 years relevant working experience are also accepted. .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

STPM.text: Pass STPM with minimum GPA 2.33 in 2 subjects including Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

Foundation.text: Pass Foundation with minimum CGPA 2.33 in 2 subjects including Biology, Physics/Mathematics or Chemistry .  *All applications are subjected to assessment by Institution.

course_content.core: 专业基础课 康复物理治疗学导论 正常人体解剖学 生理学 普通心理学 人体运动学 人体发育学 运动生理学 运动功能解剖学 运动控制 神经科学 中国传统康复基础 中医基础理论 专业课 物理因子治疗学 物理治疗评定学 手法治疗学 肌骨关节疾病物理治疗 I 肌骨关节疾病物理治疗 II 神经疾病物理治疗 I 神经疾病物理治疗 II 肌骨关节疾病物理治疗实训 II 神经系统疾病物理治疗实训 I 心肺疾病物理治疗 儿童疾病物理治疗学 中国传统康复技能 人体运动学 运动生理学 物理治疗评定学 中国传统康复技能 小学期实践 护理理论与实践 康复见习（一）（含劳动教育） 针推实践 康复见习（二）（含劳动教育） 康复实训 毕业实习 科室轮转 岗前培训 技能考试 综述 毕业实习讲座

course_content.core: 第一学年 第一学期 新生导航 中医基础理论 正常人体解剖学 中医汉语（一） 第二学期 中医诊断学 组织胚胎学 医用化学 中医汉语（二） 中国概况（一） 第三学期 中医诊法技能训练 人文社会实践（一） 中诊系列讲座 教学实践（一） 第二学年 第一学期 中药学 生物化学 生理学 人文教育 第二学期 方剂学 医古文 病理学 第三学期 医患沟通技能训练 人文社会实践（二） 教学实践（二）（含健康服务基本技能） 中药理论知识临床应用考试 第三学年 第一学期 中医内科学（一） 诊断学基础 影像诊断学 内经选读 中医文体写作（一） 药理学 第二学期 中医内科学（二） 西医内科学 西医外科学 伤寒论选读 中医文体写作（二） 医学伦理学 第三学期 第三学期 临床技能实训 教学实践（三）（含全科医学概论与社区实践） 方剂临床应用考试 第四学年 第一学期 中医外科学 金匮要略选读 针灸学 推拿学 第二学期 中医儿科学 中医妇科学 温病名著选读 中医各家学说 第五学年 毕业实习培训 毕业实习 毕业水平考试

course_content.core: Compulsory Courses Normal Human Anatomy TCM Basic Theory Basic Chinese Language Basics of Chemistry Healthcare Physical Education Biochemistry Tuina Exercise Meridians and Points Overview of China Microbiology Guidance for Humanity Social Practice Case Studies TCM Diagnostics Chinese Materia Medical Physiology Intermediate-level Chinese Language Formulas of Chinese Herbal Medicine Introduction to TCM Classics Basics of Pathology Acupuncture and Moxibustion Technique Theory of Tuina Manipulations Pharmacology Basics of Diagnostics TCM Internal Medicine Clinical Conversations in Traditional Chinese Medicine Tuina Practice on Human Body Radiology Acupuncture and Moxibustion Technique Internal Medicine Anatomy of Acupuncture Medical Terminology Selective Readings of Acupuncture Classics History of Chinese Medicine Practice of Acupuncture and Moxibustion Techniques Overview on TCM-Style Writing Tuina Therapeutics Acupuncture Therapeutics TCM Traumatology Medical Ethics General Introduction to Rehabilitation Neurology TCM Emergencies Clinical Psychology
